info: Type of alert to be shown. 1: Alert box, 2: Alert window
loginalert2: Login failed. Incorrect email or password.

cartalert2: Addition to cart failed. Please refresh page and try again.
cartalert3: Your cart already has 3 items. Please remove an item if you want to add another.
cartalert4: This item could not be found.
cartalert5: There is not enough of this item in stock.
cartedit2: Cart edit failed. Please refresh page and try again.
cartedit4: This item could not be found within your cart.
cartchangequantity2: Cart edit failed. Please refresh page and try again.
cartchangequantity4: This item could not be found within your cart.
cartchangequantity5: This item could not be found.
cartchangequantity7: There is not enough of this item in stock.
registeralert1: Registration was successful! Enter your email and password here to login.
registeralert2: Please log out before creating a new account.
registeralert3: Registration failed. Please refresh page and try again.
registeralert4: Passwords do not mach. Please try again.
registeralert5: This email address is taken. Please use another one.
registeralert6: Failed to created account. Please try again later.
orderalert2: Please login to place your order.
orderalert3: Your shopping cart is empty. Please add a product to place an order.
orderalert7: Your cart contains more than 3 items. Please remove additional items before placing an order.
orderalert8: We currently don't have enough stock for one or more of the items in your cart. Please change your order then retry.
orderalert9: Your cart contains an item with an invalid quantity. Please amend before placing an order.
confirmationalert2: You are not logged in. To review your order, please login here.
confirmationalert3: This order number could not be found. Please try again.
confirmationalert4: This order is not associated with your account. Please login to view.
